articles.title: 'Thanks to Kohli for all those years': Nagal cherishes 'King'-sized support - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sumit Nagal acknowledged the contributions of Virat Kohli after defeating Alexander Bublik in the first round of the Australian Open 2024. | Tennis News
articles.content: Indian tennis and its entire fraternity had reasons to smile on Tuesday as Sumit Nagal, its face, achieved the biggest accomplishment of his singles career. Nagal, the highest-ranked Indian singles p… [+3102 chars]
